article_title: Sorry Mr. Ryan, But Corporate-Only Tax Reform Doesn't Work

article_metadata.author: Tony Nitti

og.description: When as simple a task as passing an extenders package leads to infighting, revenge tactics, and claims of betrayal within Congress, you know we're a long, long way from comprehensive tax reform becoming a reality. You may call me a pessimist, but consider this: resurrecting the 55 expired tax laws has been an unmitigated disaster, [...]
